name: Identify Replicants
description: Use the Voight-Kampff test to identify potential replicants in the city. Essential for maintaining order.

name: Monitor Spice Levels
description: Oversee spice production on Arrakis. Monitor for any unusual activity or disruptions in the spice flow.

name: Study Solaris Ocean
description: Conduct a detailed study of the Solaris ocean's behavior. Analyze patterns and record any anomalies.

name: Artifact Retrieval
description: Lead an expedition into The Zone to retrieve rumored powerful artifacts. Ensure safety protocols are followed.

name: Investigate Uprising
description: Investigate and report on any signs of a replicant uprising. Maintain secrecy and discretion.
